0.title: Gamp
0.short: Discover new recipes, share your favorites.
0.long: Gamp is a platform for exploring new recipes, both foods and drinks. As the Front-end head developer, I have played a pivotal role in both the design and coding processes. Not only I contributed coding the Front-end of the project, but also I created the visual identity by designing the logo and illustrations used in the app.
0.setting: Team of three juniors full-stack developers.

1.title: TableRise
1.short: Online user-friendly platform for RPG enthusiasts.
1.long: Table Rise is an online platform for playing tabletop RPGs based on Dungeons & Dragons. My duties here started in the UX development team, helping creating the mockups in the prototyping phase. Later, I transitioned to the Front-end.
1.setting: Team of 12, including a project manager, a product owner, designers and developers.

2.title: Tattoo Library
2.long: This project was my first attempt of creating a portfolio, which later I decided to turn into my showcase of tattoo drawings. I was always fascinated by medieval characters from RPG games, and those were important inspirational aspects of my drawings.
